long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Potion allows you to easily create customized & personalized AI Videos. 

Potion is a leading AI video software that empowers you to break through the clutter and connect with your audience in deeper way. 

Who benefits from Potion videos?
- Sales & Marketing Professionals: Close more deals and build lasting relationships with personalized video email marketing.
- Recruiters: Stand out and attract top talent with engaging video introductions.
- Agency Owners: Showcase your expertise and win over clients with impactful video proposals.
- Customer Support Executives: Humanize your interactions and resolve issues faster with personalized customer experiences, delivered with video.
- Product Managers: Generate excitement for new features with engaging product demos delivered through AI video personalization.
- E-commerce Store Owners: Boost conversions and personalize shopping experiences with targeted video messages.
- Real Estate Agents: Showcase properties in a whole new light with personalized video tours.

Why choose Potion AI?
- Craft Powerful, Personalized AI Videos at Scale: Say goodbye to generic text emails and hello to personalized AI videos! Record a single message and let Potion AI's magic take over. It's like mail-merge for videos, but with the power of AI personalization.
- Generate Videos From Text: Use our Personal AI avatars to bring the human element to automated communications. It mimics your gestures, facial expressions, and speech patterns. Thus, making the content feel more engaging and relatable. 
- Effortless Integration with Your Workflow: Streamline your personalized video outreach with Potion AI. Seamlessly integrate with LinkedIn Messenger and Gmail. Create and share personalized videos at scale directly within your existing tools in just a few clicks.
- Boost Sales & Marketing Results: Studies show that personalized videos can increase response rates by up to 500%. With Potion AI, you can easily create personalized video sales letters (VSLs), do AI video prospecting, and run personalized video email marketing campaigns that resonate with your audience and drive results.
- AI Prospecting Powerhouse: Level up your AI cold outreach with personalized video emails. Potion is one of the most accessible AI video prospecting software. Thus, you can craft personalized videos at scale to build trust and convert leads faster.

Get Started with Potion AI in Minutes:
1. Install the Free Chrome Extension: Get up and running quickly with Potion AI's easy-to-use Chrome extension.
2. Create Personalized Video Templates: Log in to your Potion account and record an engaging video base template tailored to your specific audience and goals.
3. Record Once, Personalize for All: Our AI video personalization software transforms your single recording into personalized videos for each recipient. It's like having your own AI video production team working for you.
4. Don’t Wanna Record? Just Type: Once you've trained our video AI, creating videos with your own face and voice is as simple as typing out a script. It’s that easy! Ready to see the magic in action? Try it today and experience the future of AI video creation.
5. Share Your Videos with Ease: Choose from various sharing options, including links, GIFs, and direct email embedding into LinkedIn messages.

Benefits of Using Potion AI:
- Build Stronger Relationships: Showcase your genuine interest and connect with clients on a deeper level through personalized video communication.
- Stand Out from the Crowd: Break through the text-based email fatigue and grab attention with visually engaging and personalized AI videos.
- Boost Trust with Your Audience: Demonstrate your commitment and authenticity with personalized video messages, leading to increased trust and conversions.
- Drive Sales & Upsells: Deliver compelling video pitches and personalized product demos to close deals faster and nurture existing customer relationships with impactful video messages.


Potion is the easiest way to create mass personalized videos. 

Potion auto-generates personalized videos without having to record individual videos for each recipient. 

Potion videos work like mail-merge, but for videos. Record for one, personalize for all. 

You can record and send videos directly from LinkedIn messenger and Gmail.

Potion videos can be shared as links, GIFs, or embedded within your LinkedIn direct messages to add some character and some personalization to your written correspondence. 

You can use personalized videos in your emails to:
- Build stronger relationships with your clients
- Stand out from other sales people
- Increase trust with your prospects
- Upsell to existing customers
- Deliver powerful sales pitches and demos

Don't just send plane old boring text based emails, send Potion!
